verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a bond-servant of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> [as] an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> <S%G873>set<s%> <S%G873>apart<s%> for the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4279>promised<s%> <S%G4279>beforehand<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G4396>prophets<s%> in the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>
<S%G4012>concerning<s%> His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> who was <S%G1096>born<s%> of a <S%G4690>descendant<s%> of <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

who was <S%G3724>declared<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> by the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

<S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G651>apostleship<s%> to <S%G1519>bring<s%> <S%G1519>about<s%> [the] <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> for His name's <S%G5228>sake,<s%>
<S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> are the <S%G2822>called<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

to <S%G3956>all<s%> who are <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> [as] <S%G40>saints:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G4413>First,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> is being <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> in my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> in the [preaching of the] <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> is my <S%G3144>witness<s%> [as to] <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G89>unceasingly<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you,

<S%G3842>always<s%> in my <S%G4335>prayers<s%> <S%G1189>making<s%> <S%G1189>request,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4458>perhaps<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>last<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> I may <S%G2137>succeed<s%> in <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you.

For I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> you in <S%G2443>order<s%> that I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> to you, that you may be <S%G4741>established;<s%>

that is, that I may be <S%G4837>encouraged<s%> <S%G4837>together<s%> with you [while] <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G240>each<s%> of us by the other's <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4771>yours<s%> and <S%G1473>mine.<s%>

And I do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G50>unaware,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that <S%G4178>often<s%> I have <S%G4388>planned<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you (and have been <S%G2967>prevented<s%> <S%G891>thus<s%> <S%G891>far<s%>) in <S%G2443>order<s%> that I might <S%G2192>obtain<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>under<s%> <S%G3781>obligation<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> and to <S%G915>barbarians,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise<s%> and to the <S%G453>foolish.<s%>
<S%G3779>Thus,<s%> for my <S%G1473>part,<s%> I am <S%G4289>eager<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>

For I <S%G1870>am<s%> not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> for it is the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4100>believes,<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> and <S%G5037>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

For in it [the] <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> from <S%G4102>faith<s%> to <S%G4102>faith;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "But the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> [man] shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>"

For the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> and <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> who <S%G2722>suppress<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> in <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%>

<S%G1360>because<s%> that <S%G1110>which<s%> is <S%G1110>known<s%> about <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5318>evident<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> them; for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5319>made<s%> it <S%G5319>evident<s%> to them.

For <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> His <S%G517>invisible<s%> attributes, His <S%G126>eternal<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G2305>divine<s%> <S%G2305>nature,<s%> have been <S%G2529>clearly<s%> <S%G2529>seen,<s%> being <S%G3539>understood<s%> through <S%G4161>what<s%> <S%G4161>has<s%> <S%G4161>been<s%> <S%G4161>made,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that they are <S%G379>without<s%> <S%G379>excuse.<s%>

For even though they <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> they did not <S%G1392>honor<s%> Him as <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks;<s%> but they <S%G3154>became<s%> <S%G3154>futile<s%> in their <S%G1261>speculations,<s%> and their <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened.<s%>
<S%G5335>Professing<s%> to be <S%G4680>wise,<s%> they <S%G3471>became<s%> <S%G3471>fools,<s%>

and <S%G236>exchanged<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for an <S%G1504>image<s%> in the <S%G3667>form<s%> of <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> and of <S%G4071>birds<s%> and four-footed <S%G5074>animals<s%> and <S%G2062>crawling<s%> <S%G2062>creatures.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them <S%G3860>over<s%> in the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G167>impurity,<s%> that their <S%G4983>bodies<s%> might be <S%G818>dishonored<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them.

For they <S%G3337>exchanged<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> and <S%G4573>worshiped<s%> and <S%G3000>served<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> <S%G3844>rather<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G2936>Creator,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them <S%G3860>over<s%> to <S%G819>degrading<s%> <S%G3806>passions;<s%> for their <S%G2338>women<s%> <S%G3337>exchanged<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>function<s%> for that which is <S%G3844>unnatural,<s%> <S%G5449><s%>

and in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G7021>men<s%> <S%G863>abandoned<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>function<s%> of the <S%G2338>woman<s%> and <S%G1572>burned<s%> in their <S%G3715>desire<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G7021>men<s%> with <S%G7021>men<s%> <S%G2716>committing<s%> <S%G808>indecent<s%> <S%G808>acts<s%> and <S%G618>receiving<s%> in their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1438>persons<s%> the <S%G1163>due<s%> <S%G489>penalty<s%> of their <S%G4106>error.<s%>

And <S%G2531>just<s%> as they did not <S%G1381>see<s%> <S%G1381>fit<s%> to <S%G2192>acknowledge<s%> <S%G1922><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> any longer, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them <S%G3860>over<s%> to a <S%G96>depraved<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are not <S%G2520>proper,<s%>

being <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G4124>greed,<s%> <S%G2549>evil;<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G5408>murder,<s%> <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G2550>malice;<s%> [they are] <S%G5588>gossips,<s%>

<S%G2637>slanderers,<s%> <S%G2319>haters<s%> of <S%G2319>God,<s%> <S%G5197>insolent,<s%> <S%G5244>arrogant,<s%> <S%G213>boastful,<s%> <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%>
<S%G801>without<s%> <S%G801>understanding,<s%> <S%G802>untrustworthy,<s%> <S%G794>unloving,<s%> <S%G415>unmerciful;<s%>

and, although they <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G1345>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practice<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%> are <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> they not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4909>give<s%> <S%G4909>hearty<s%> <S%G4909>approval<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practice<s%> them.
